meanings.definition: Toluylic (1191/92 – 1232) was the youngest son of Genghis Khan and Börte.
meanings.english_definition: Toluylic (1191/92 – 1232) was the youngest son of Genghis Khan and Börte.

examples.sentence: Toluylic was the father of Mongke Khan and Kublai Khan.
examples.translation: トルイはモンケ・ハンとクビライ・ハンの父でした。
